title: McGregor vs. Mayweather Fight Called Off After Mayweather’s Arrest?
subtitle: An old news report about Floyd Mayweather's 2010 arrest appeared with a misleading title in July 2017.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: The August 2017 fight between Floyd Mayweather Jr. and Conor McGregor was called off after the former was arrested in July 2017.
